title: PM to visit flood-hit areas in Sindhâ€™s Qambar Shahdad Kot
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 05 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will visit Qamber Shahdad Kot in Sindh today to oversee the flood relief activities in the flood-hit areas.
The prime minister will meet the flood victims at the relief camps set up to accommodate a large number of displaced people.
He will also undertake an aerial view of the inundated areas to assess the damage incurred by the flash floods.
